metadata.title: Security and Encryption function of RA0 Series

sections.content:
Question:
What kind of Security functions are supported by RA0 Series?
Answer:
RA0E1 implements TRNG (True Random Number Generator) and unique ID as hardware functions.
Cryptographic functions such as AES will be provided by software. Please contact our sales for software release dates.
Suitable Products
RA0E1
